abstract: Sen Bernie Sanders has remained rigorously on message not just for presidential election cycle but ever since he first started running for office 40 years ago; Sanders has consistently talked about political revolution, plight of working class, campaign finance and failings of corporate media.

headline.print_headline: Over Decades, Sanders Has Stayed on Message
headline.main: Bernie Sanders Consistent Over Decades in His Call for ‘Revolution’

snippet: The candidate has always spoken about what he sees as an economy rigged against the working class and a campaign finance system that corrupts politicians.
lead_paragraph: The candidate has always spoken about what he sees as an economy rigged against the working class and a campaign finance system that corrupts politicians.
